string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: 1.Sometimes E lock screen off, can\'t lock screen?
2.Can\'t disable system lock screen, display double lock screen?

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: Do not use cleaning software to clean the "E Locker", this will lead to lock screen fail. \n\n Improved method: \ "E Locker"to join the process of white list program / ignore list in cleaning up the software (not clear list)," let the E Lokcer running as usual.
Enter settings and select disable system lock screen, then select none for disable system lock screen.
